hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Masud (RAH) narrated that:the Messenger of Allah said: “There is no one who does not pay Zakat on his wealth but a bald headed snake will be made to appear to him on the Day of Resurrection, until it encircles his neck.” Then the messenger of Allah recited the following Verse from the Book of Allah the Most High: “And let not those who covetously withhold of that which Allah had bestowed on them of His Bounty(wealth) think that is good for them”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَنْعِ الزَّكَاةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning withholding Zakat
